items.sentence: Can you tell me exactly what you're trying to do?
Tom and Mary passed the time playing board games.
Tom bought a pair of polarized sunglasses online.
Every time Tom called Mary, he got a busy signal.
Tom couldn't help but notice Mary smiling at him.
Some people think French is a difficult language.
Tom said Mary has been told not to do that again.
You know that I'm supposed to do that, don't you?
You know that I have to do that today, don't you?
You do know you don't need to do that, don't you?
You do know you don't have to do that, don't you?
You didn't know that you had to do that, did you?
Make sure that you tell Tom what I just told you.
It's still not known when that's going to happen.
Do you really believe that that's what Tom wants?
Walking to work every day is one way to stay fit.
In Japan, a census is conducted every five years.
When was the last time you took an afternoon nap?
I haven't worked at all for the last three years.
It started to rain, so I stopped mowing the lawn.
Until yesterday, I'd never sung a song in French.
I talked myself into thinking it was a good idea.
Would you like coffee or tea with your breakfast?
The men playing poker looked up from their cards.
Tom obviously wasn't happy that he'd been chosen.
Mary was a bridesmaid at Tom and Alice's wedding.
As much as Tom tried to forget Mary, he couldn't.
Tom's first job was as an usher at movie theater.
I can't believe Tom would do something like that.
I need to know what's going on so I can help you.
I'll buy it off you if you make it a bit cheaper.
I prefer taking my shirt off when I go for a run.
I'm pretty good at cracking other people's backs.
Even though Tom was in pain, he managed to smile.
Would it be OK if I brought some friends with me?
Would it be OK if I crashed on your sofa tonight?
We've already survived many difficult situations.
We tend to judge people by the company they keep.
Why don't you pick on somebody else for a change?
Why don't you put your money where your mouth is?
Why don't we go to Tom's place and see how he is?
That isn't worth the price they're asking for it.
Would you be so kind as to close the door for me?
What time do you think you're likely to get here?
I read your book and I found it very interesting.
I know where you can find who you're looking for.
The set of real numbers is closed under addition.
It doesn't really matter to me who wins or loses.
I'm surrounded by people who are smarter than me.
We're going to have spaghetti for dinner tonight.
